entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Drayton Valley
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning late in the evening then changing to flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
